content: with this pattern you can crochet a sea-urchin depending on yarn and hook size used your see urchin will be bigger or smaller than the one i made i used katia fair cotton on hook size 3 mm and my sea urchin is 7 cm wide and 3 cm high in the revised pattern i crocheted a sea urchin with beads using double stranded hobbii rainbow lace cotton on hook size 2 5 mm this urchin measures 6 cm
